title: Long delay between entering loading screen and scoreboard
body:
Recently I have been having problems with my game taking a while to open up the loading screen and the after game scoreboard. It hadn't been too bad until recently when the delay was long enough for my team /remake so by the time my loading screen opened the game was already over and I was hoping to get some help on what may be causing the problem and how I may be able to fix it.
(My game runs fairly smoothly when i actually enter the game and I only have discord open when i plan on playing a game of league)

replies.body:
This typically happens if your connection to the servers isn't entirely stable. I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

I too have this issue! It's not long enough to do a /remake, granted, however, after champion select and before the portraits with the splashes is a long wait.

I don't think it's my connection...

I found out that the fans in my computer weren't working well because of dust inside so i took a can of compressed air and shot it through the vents and that fixed most of the slow loadinng problem. I hope this helps.
